Key Match Events: Bam Adebayo recorded 20 points in the first half
Miami led by as much as 17 points
Washington had an 11-2 run in the second half
Bam Adebayo put Sarr through the rim with a driving dunk
Post-Match Reflections: Jimmy Butler had an effective mid-range jumper
Bam Adebayo's three-point shooting is developing
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pelle Larsson got minutes in place of Duncan Robinson
